particle_framework_docs module¶

Programming for Social Science - Assignment 2. Bactrial Particle Class and code to execute.

Created on Mon Oct 12 15:26:42 2020 @author: Shivani Sickotra

class particle_framework_docs.Particle(town, particles, y, x)¶

Bases: object

spread(p_east, p_west, p_north, p_south)¶

Random walk particles 1 step in one of four directions, depending on direction probabilities assigned by user.

p_eastint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving east.

p_westint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving west.

p_northint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving north.

p_southint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving south.

None.

turbulance(p_rise, p_same, p_fall)¶

Random walk particles 1 step either up or down, depending on turbulance probabilities assigned by user, until all particles reach the ground.

p_riseint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle rising upwards.

p_sameint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle remaining at the same level.

p_fallint or float.

Variable for percentage probability of particle falling downwards.

None.

Bacterial Bomb
